channel.title: FLF - The Comedian Next Door

channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: TCND: What's Juan DeVevo Thinking? (Part 2) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
Hello, Neighbor! You're jumping into this conversation that's already underway between the Comedian Next Door (John Branyan) and his good buddy, Juan DeVevo. (It's okay. Just pull up a chair and make yourself comfortable. They'll make room for you.)  If you'd like to hear Part 1, go back to last week's episode!

Juan often drops by the Comedian's house to chat about the cultural things on his mind. 

What does it mean to be a good person? What does Christian living look like?  (Flip to the book of Philemon for spoilers.)  What's wrong with the so-called "Purity Movement"?  Guys, these questions come up in just the first 10 minutes... 

What's Juan thinking today?

To contact the Comedian Next Door, email nextdoor@johnbranyan.com . To find out where Juan is touring, visit Castingcrowns.com
item.author: FLF, LLC
